title: Thor
description: Willow is no joke.She’s fire and fury, the only woman who’s ever kept me on my toes.I was supposed to protect her.But Willow doesn’t need a savior—she can handle herself just fine.At least, that’s what I thought.Until she’s taken in the night.Now, there’s no holding me back.No rules. No mercy.She’s about to see just how deep my hatred for the cartel runs—Because no one touches my girl and lives to tell the tale.Thor (The Black Hornets MC #5) is a dark, steamy motorcycle club romance with edge-of-your-seat suspense, scorching chemistry, and an antihero who will destroy anyone who dares to take what’s his.
author: Savannah Rylan
